json_to_edit.voice_over: In the attic of wonder, stories came alive with a touch of magic.
json_to_edit.description: Lily discovers a magical book in her grandfather's attic that brings stories to life.
json_to_edit.lighting: Soft, golden light streaming through a small window
json_to_edit.name: The Magical Storybook
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Lily and Grandpa Joe experience the magic of a book that brings stories to life in the attic.

qa.action: Lily enters the attic, eyes wide with wonder as she takes in the cluttered space filled with old treasures.

hf.action: Lily's hand reaches out to touch an old, leather-bound book that seems to glow faintly.

tr.action: As Lily opens the book, colorful butterflies emerge from its pages, fluttering around her in a magical dance.

xc.action: Grandpa Joe enters the attic, smiling knowingly as he watches Lily interact with the magical book.

ka.action: Lily and Grandpa Joe sit together, turning pages that transform the attic into various storybook scenes around them.

fn.action: Lily's eyes sparkle with delight as she looks up at Grandpa Joe, both surrounded by the magic of storytelling.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every three existing shots, making sure not to change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: In the attic of wonder, stories came alive with a touch of magic.
updated_json.description: Lily discovers a magical book in her grandfather's attic that brings stories to life.
updated_json.lighting: Soft, golden light streaming through a small window
updated_json.name: The Magical Storybook
updated_json.scene_summary: Lily and Grandpa Joe experience the magic of a book that brings stories to life in the attic.

qa.action: Lily enters the attic, eyes wide with wonder as she takes in the cluttered space filled with old treasures.

hf.action: Lily's hand reaches out to touch an old, leather-bound book that seems to glow faintly.

tr.action: As Lily opens the book, colorful butterflies emerge from its pages, fluttering around her in a magical dance.

yz.action: From behind Lily, we see the attic transforming, with shimmering outlines of fantastical creatures and landscapes appearing in the corners.

xc.action: Grandpa Joe enters the attic, smiling knowingly as he watches Lily interact with the magical book.

ka.action: Lily and Grandpa Joe sit together, turning pages that transform the attic into various storybook scenes around them.

fn.action: Lily's eyes sparkle with delight as she looks up at Grandpa Joe, both surrounded by the magic of storytelling.

wx.action: The book's pages glow brightly, reflecting in both Lily's and Grandpa Joe's eyes, symbolizing the shared magic of their imagination.

label.rationale: we will add two new shots to the scene, one after the third existing shot and another after the sixth (last) existing shot. this will increase the total number of shots from 6 to 8. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field accordingly and add the new shots to the "shots" dictionary. we'll also update the "list_display_order" to include the new shots in the correct positions. the new shots will be creative and fit well with the existing scene, maintaining the magical and whimsical atmosphere.

value.action: From behind Lily, we see the attic transforming, with shimmering outlines of fantastical creatures and landscapes appearing in the corners.
The book's pages glow brightly, reflecting in both Lily's and Grandpa Joe's eyes, symbolizing the shared magic of their imagination.
